name: Hamlet
summary_text: Modern-day New York City adaptation of Shakespeare's immortal story about Hamlet's plight to avenge his father's murder.

name: I Still Believe
summary_text: The true-life story of Christian music star Jeremy Camp and his journey of love and loss that looks to prove there is always hope.

name: Vivah
summary_text: Poonam, a traditionally brought-up young woman, is to marry Prem, a groom chosen by her uncle. Poonam and Prem's faith and love are to be tested however, when an accident occurs and Poonam might be scarred for life.

name: Turn Me On, Dammit!
summary_text: In Skoddeheimen, Norway, 15-year-old Alma is consumed by her hormones and fantasies that range from sweetly romantic images of Artur, the boyfriend she yearns for, to daydreams about practically everybody she lays eyes on.

name: Khuda Kay Liye
summary_text: The movie deals with the difference of opinion between the westernized, educated, modern Muslims and their counterparts who follow their religion and live life in the name of 'God'.

name: Murmur of the Heart
summary_text: As France is nearing the end of the first Indochina War, an open-minded teenage boy finds himself torn between a rebellious urge to discover love, and the ever-present, almost dominating affection of his beloved mother.

name: Baasha
summary_text: An auto driver, Manikam, desperately tries to hide his dark underworld side to keep his promise to his father.

name: RocketMan
summary_text: Fred Z. Randall is a geeky spacecraft designer who gets the chance to make his dream come true and travel to Mars.

name: Highlander: The Source
summary_text: Duncan MacLeod and his fellow Immortals quest to locate the Grail of their world.

name: The Addiction
summary_text: A New York philosophy grad student turns into a vampire after getting bitten by one, and then tries to come to terms with her new lifestyle and frequent craving for human blood.

name: American Renegades
summary_text: A team of Navy SEALs discover an underwater treasure in a Bosnian lake.

name: Blue in the Face
summary_text: Brooklyn Cigar Store is a neighborhood hangout in Brooklyn with Auggie Wren/H.Keitel as center. Some people are interviewed about Brooklyn, spiced up with statistics on Brooklyn.

name: Sink or Swim
summary_text: A depressed man joins a synchronized swimming team made up of middle aged men.

name: We Are the Nobles
summary_text: Three spoiled children who are cut off from their family fortune and forced to do the unthinkable - get a job.

name: The Fourth Protocol
summary_text: John Preston is a British Agent with the task of preventing the Russians detonating a nuclear explosion next to an American base in the UK. The Russians are hoping this will shatter the "special relationship" between the two countries.

name: Obsession
summary_text: A wealthy New Orleans businessman becomes obsessed with a young woman who resembles his wife.

name: Le fils
summary_text: A joinery instructor at a rehab center refuses to take a new teen as his apprentice, but then begins to follow the boy through the hallways and streets.

name: The Little Stranger
summary_text: After a doctor is called to visit a crumbling manor, strange things begin to occur.

name: Best Man Down
summary_text: A newlywed couple cancels their honeymoon and returns to the snowy Midwest to make the funeral arrangements for their best man, who died unexpectedly after their ceremony.

name: Ghilli
summary_text: Velu, an aspiring kabaddi player, goes to Madurai to participate in a regional match, where he rescues Dhanalakshmi from Muthupandi, a powerful man keen on marrying the girl against her will.

name: Proud Mary
summary_text: Mary (Taraji P. Henson) is a hit woman working for an organized crime family in Boston, whose life is completely turned around when she meets a young boy whose path she crosses when a professional hit goes bad.

name: Chicken with Plums
summary_text: Since his beloved violin was broken, Nasser Ali Khan, one of the most renowned musicians of his day, has lost all taste for life. Finding no instrument worthy of replacing it, he decides to confine himself to bed to await death.

name: Hemingway & Gellhorn
summary_text: A drama centered on the romance between Ernest Hemingway and World War II correspondent Martha Gellhorn, Hemingway's inspiration for For Whom the Bell Tolls, and the only woman who ever asked for a divorce from the writer.

name: What Planet Are You From?
summary_text: A human-looking alien from a highly advanced but emotionless all-male society is sent to Earth to impregnate a woman and bring the child back to their planet. The alien ends up falling in love there. A suspicious F.A.A. Agent targets him.

name: Ratcatcher
summary_text: An naïve young lad navigates the dirty squalid streets of 1973 Glasgow, and the poor youth around him.

name: Blackthorn
summary_text: In Bolivia, Butch Cassidy (now calling himself James Blackthorn) pines for one last sight of home, an adventure that aligns him with a young robber and makes the duo a target for gangs and lawmen alike.

name: The Eighth Day
summary_text: An unusual and wonderful friendship develops between a busy but unhappy salesman and a resident of a mental asylum.

name: The Principal
summary_text: A teacher is assigned to be the principal of a violent and crime-ridden high school.

name: Infinity Chamber
summary_text: A man trapped in an automated prison must outsmart a computer in order to escape.

name: Sinav
summary_text: Five high school students plans to steal University Entrance Exam booklets.

name: Waterloo Bridge
summary_text: During World War I, believing her fiancé to be dead, a young ballerina loses her job and is forced to turn to prostitution.

name: Grace Is Gone
summary_text: Upon hearing his wife was killed in the Iraq war, a father takes his two daughters on a road trip.

name: Chisum
summary_text: Cattle baron John Chisum joins forces with Billy the Kid and Pat Garrett to fight the Lincoln County land war.

name: Flight 93
summary_text: Flight 93 is the story of the heroic passengers that took back their plane in an effort to stop a 9-11 terrorist attack.

name: Manichitrathazhu
summary_text: When a forbidden room in an old bungalow is unbolted, the spirit of a vengeful dancer is unleashed.

name: Hacker
summary_text: With the help of his new friends Alex Danyliuk turns to a life of crime and identity theft.

name: The Weight of Water
summary_text: A newspaper photographer researches an 1873 double homicide and finds her own life paralleling that of a witness who survived the tragic ordeal.

name: Desert Heat
summary_text: A man (JCVD) drives out in the desert where some men steal his motorcycle and leave him for dead. He survives and no longer thinks of suicide as he now has a purpose in life: revenge and getting his bike back.

name: Kill Your Friends
summary_text: An A&R man working at the height of the Britpop music craze goes to extremes in order to find his next hit.

name: The Thinning
summary_text: In a future, overcrowded, dystopian society, students with the lowest test scores are culled. Two students discover errors with the test.

name: Married Life
summary_text: A 1940s-set drama where an adulterous man plots his wife's death instead of putting her through the humiliation of a divorce.

name: Eyes of Laura Mars
summary_text: A famous fashion photographer develops a disturbing ability to see through the eyes of a killer.

name: The Pirates of Somalia
summary_text: In 2008, rookie journalist Jay Bahadur forms a half-baked plan to embed himself with the pirates of Somalia. He ultimately succeeds in providing the first close-up look into who these men are, how they live, and the forces that drive them.

name: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc II - The Battle for Doldrey
summary_text: For three years, Guts believed his mission was to pursue Griffith's dream together with him. But in order to become Griffith's equal and truly be called his friend, Guts realizes he will ...                See full summary »

name: Woyzeck
summary_text: Franz Woyzeck is a hapless, hopeless soldier, alone and powerless in society, assaulted from all sides by forces he can not control.

name: The Earrings of Madame De...
summary_text: When an aristocratic woman known only as "Madame de . . ." sells a pair of earrings given to her by her husband in order to pay some debts, she sets off a chain reaction of financial and carnal consequences that can end only in despair.

name: Anamorph
summary_text: A psychological thriller based on the concept of anamorphosis, a painting technique that manipulates the laws of perspective to create two competing images on a single canvas.

name: Cherry 2000
summary_text: In 2017, a successful businessman travels to the ends of the earth to find that the perfect woman is always under his nose. He hires a sexy renegade tracker to find an exact duplicate of his android wife.

name: Invasion U.S.A.
summary_text: A one-man army comes to the rescue of the United States when a spy attempts an invasion.

name: Johnny Handsome
summary_text: After being double crossed and thrown in jail, a deformed gangster gets a new face and rehabilitation, but his desire for revenge looms.

name: Battle of the Year
summary_text: Battle of the Year attracts all the best teams from around the world, but the Americans haven't won in fifteen years. Dante enlists Blake to assemble a team of the best dancers and bring the Trophy back to America where it started.

name: The Traitor
summary_text: The real life of Tommaso Buscetta, the so-called "boss of the two worlds," the first mafia informant in Sicily in the 1980s.

name: Divines
summary_text: A street teenager from a dysfunctional family from a banlieue (HLMs) in Paris comes across a young dancer who turns her life upside down.

name: Dracula: Prince of Darkness
summary_text: Dracula is resurrected, preying on four unsuspecting visitors to his castle.

name: The Souvenir
summary_text: A young film student in the early '80s becomes romantically involved with a complicated and untrustworthy man.

name: The Friends of Eddie Coyle
summary_text: After his last crime has him looking at a long prison sentence for repeat offenses, a low level Boston gangster decides to snitch on his friends to avoid jail time.

name: Sound of Noise
summary_text: A tone-deaf cop works to track down a group of guerilla percussionists whose anarchic public performances are terrorizing the city.

name: Cool as Ice
summary_text: A rapper gets stuck in a small town and falls for a local girl whose family is in witness protection.

name: Five Times Two
summary_text: Five stages in the romance between a woman and a man.

name: Kirikou and the Sorceress
summary_text: In a troubled African village, an unusual baby is born.

name: Buster's Mal Heart
summary_text: A family man's chance encounter with a conspiracy-obsessed drifter leaves him on the run from the police and an impending event known as the Inversion.

name: Pieces
summary_text: The co-eds of a Boston college campus are targeted by a mysterious killer who is creating a human jigsaw puzzle from their body parts.

name: Klopka
summary_text: "THE TRAP" is a modern film noir reflecting the true face of Serbian (Eastern European) 'society in transition.' It's a story that could happen to you. It is a film about an ordinary man, ...                See full summary »

name: Ladybugs
summary_text: To climb the corporate ladder to success, a guy agrees to coach the company's all-girls soccer team with the help of his secret weapon: his fiancee's son.

name: Pinocchio
summary_text: Old woodcarver Geppetto's puppet creation, Pinocchio, magically comes to life with dreams of becoming a real boy. Easily led astray, Pinocchio tumbles from one misadventure to another as he is tricked, kidnapped and chased by bandits.

name: Lawnmower Man 2: Beyond Cyberspace
summary_text: Jobe is resuscitated by Jonathan Walker. He wants Jobe to create a special computer chip that would connect all the computers in the world into one network, which Walker would control and ...                See full summary »

name: The Legend of Billie Jean
summary_text: A Texas teenager cuts her hair short and becomes an outlaw martyr with her brother and friends.

name: Love, Wedding, Marriage
summary_text: A happy newlywed marriage counselor's views on wedded bliss get thrown for a loop when she finds out her parents are getting divorced.

name: House of D
summary_text: By working through problems stemming from his past, Tom Warshaw, an American artist living in Paris, begins to discover who he really is, and returns to his home to reconcile with his family and friends.

name: Switch
summary_text: A sexist womanizer is killed by one of his former lovers and then reincarnated as a woman.

name: Death Wish 4: The Crackdown
summary_text: Architect/vigilante Paul Kersey takes on the members of a vicious Los Angeles drug cartel to stop the flow of drugs after his girlfriend's daughter dies from an overdose.

name: Mary Magdalene
summary_text: Twelve men heard and spread the message of Jesus. Only one woman understood it.

name: Bo Burnham: Make Happy
summary_text: Bo Burnham tackles life, death, sexuality, hypocrisy, mental illness and Pringles cans in his dazzling new stand-up special.

name: Nannaku Prematho
summary_text: An intelligent son of a former entrepreneur takes revenge on a powerful and rich businessman who is as smart as he is.

name: Sky Blue
summary_text: 2142: Pollution and climate change wiped out most of Earth's population. Ecoban city is built to withstand this. Suppression results in revolt. A childhood couple find each other as adults on opposing sides.

name: Big Fan
summary_text: A hard-core New York Giants fan struggles to deal with the consequences when he is beaten up by his favorite player.

name: The Domestics
summary_text: In the weeks following an apocalyptic event, a husband and wife venture across the countryside inhabited by deadly factions in search of safety, and must work together as they are pushed to the breaking point in order to survive.

name: Astérix et la surprise de César
summary_text: Obelix falls for a new arrival in his home village in Gaul, but is heartbroken when her true love arrives to visit her. However, the lovers are kidnapped by Romans; Asterix and Obelix set ...                See full summary »

name: The Rezort
summary_text: The ReZort, a safari park, offers paying guests the opportunity to kill as many zombies as they please following an outbreak.

name: Sien lui yau wan
summary_text: After a string of bad luck, a debt collector has no other choice than to spend the night in a haunted temple, where he encounters a ravishing female ghost and later battles to save her soul from the control of a wicked tree demon.

name: White Dog
summary_text: A trainer attempts to retrain a vicious dog that's been raised to attack black people.

name: Ms .45
summary_text: A timid and mute seamstress goes insane after being attacked and raped twice in one day, in which she takes to the streets of New York City after dark and randomly shoots men with a .45 caliber pistol.

name: Jeruzalem
summary_text: When a couple of American young adults fly to Israel to visit the city of Jerusalem, a biblical nightmare falls upon them.

name: Iron Sky: The Coming Race
summary_text: A follow-up to the film Iron Sky (2012) in which Nazis plan to take over the world after lying dormant in a secret military base on the moon.

name: Dave Chappelle: Killin' Them Softly
summary_text: Dave Chappelle returns to D.C. and riffs on politics, police, race relations, drugs, Sesame Street and more.

name: Night Train
summary_text: Two passengers and the conductor discover that a man has passed away on their night train cabin. They come across a mysterious object in a box the dead man was carrying and they all wish to keep for themselves.

name: Angst
summary_text: A troubled man gets released from prison and starts taking out his sadistic fantasies on an unsuspecting family living in a secluded house.

name: Hell Baby
summary_text: An expectant couple who moves into the most haunted house in New Orleans call upon the services of the Vatican's elite exorcism team to save them from a demonic baby.

name: It Boy
summary_text: Alice works for "Rebelle" magazine, where she needs to let her hair down to get a promotion. When Balthazar returns a lost USB to Alice, the appearance of dating someone half her age helps her. Does it get real?

name: The Man in the White Suit
summary_text: An altruistic chemist invents a fabric which resists wear and stain as a boon to humanity, but big business and labor realize it must be suppressed for economic reasons.

name: Propaganda
summary_text: Based on a true story set in 1948, customs officer Mehti is faced with the duty of formally setting up the border between Turkey and Syria, dividing his hometown. He is unaware of the pain ...                See full summary »

name: Eve's Bayou
summary_text: What did little Eve see--and how will it haunt her? Husband, father and womanizer Louis Batiste is the head of an affluent family, but it's the women who rule this gothic world of secrets, lies and mystic forces.

name: Underdogs
summary_text: A young man named Amadeo sets off on an unexpected adventure with the players of his beloved Foosball game.

name: Love and Honor
summary_text: When a young soldier in Vietnam gets dumped by his hometown girl, he and his best friend decide to go AWOL and return to the States to win her back.

name: The Beast of War
summary_text: A Soviet tank and its warring crew become separated from their patrol and lost in an Afghan valley with a group of vengeance-seeking rebels on their tracks.

name: Desperados
summary_text: A panicked young woman, with her reluctant friends in tow, rushes to Mexico to try and delete a ranting email she sent to her new boyfriend.

name: Flight of the Living Dead
summary_text: A mad scientist transferring a dead woman in a freezer with an armed guard on a plane to Paris. After a bit of turbulence, the freezer breaks down and she is awake, then turns into a zombie and starts to infect all on board.

name: Wu ji
summary_text: Empowered by the love of a slave (Jang), a royal concubine (Cheung) is given the chance to make an extraordinary decision.

name: Ryan's Daughter
summary_text: Set in the wake of the 1916 Easter Rising, a married woman in a small Irish village has an affair with a troubled British officer.

name: The Coldest Game
summary_text: During 1962's Cuban missile crisis, a troubled math genius finds himself drafted to play in a U.S.-Soviet chess match -- and a deadly game of espionage.

name: Ladies vs. Ricky Bahl
summary_text: A smooth and charming conman, Ricky Bahl, cons girls for a living but finally meets his match is this fun-filled "ROM-CON."

name: Infestation
summary_text: A slacker awakes to find himself weak and wrapped in a webbing; after realizing that the world has been taken over by giant alien insects, he wakes a ragtag group of strangers and together they fight for survival.

name: Beanpole
summary_text: 1945, Leningrad. WWII has devastated the city, demolishing its buildings and leaving its citizens in tatters, physically and mentally. Two young women search for meaning and hope in the struggle to rebuild their lives amongst the ruins.

name: Exodus
summary_text: The state of Israel is created in 1948, resulting in war with its Arab neighbors.

name: That Touch of Mink
summary_text: A rich businessman and a young woman are attracted to each other, but he only wants an affair while she wants to save herself for marriage.

name: This Island Earth
summary_text: Aliens come to Earth seeking scientists to help them in their war.

name: Rurouni Kenshin Part III: The Legend Ends
summary_text: Shishio has set sail in his ironclad ship to bring down the Meiji government and return Japan to chaos, carrying Kaoru with him. In order to stop him in time, Kenshin trains with his old master to learn his final technique.

name: The Details
summary_text: When a family of raccoons discover worms living underneath the sod in Jeff and Nealy's backyard, this pest problem begins a darkly comic and wild chain reaction of domestic tension, infidelity and murder.

name: Bleeding Steel
summary_text: A Special Forces Agent is assigned to protect a scientist and his creation from a sinister gang.

name: In Fear
summary_text: Driving to a music festival in Ireland, a new couple become lost and are then set upon by a tormentor with an unknown motive.

name: Ernest Goes to Jail
summary_text: Bank janitor Ernest P. Worrell is called to jury duty and soon finds himself in trouble when the lookalike defendant's attorney arranges a switch and has Ernest sent to prison in his client's place.

name: Sonchiriya
summary_text: Set in the Chambal valley, the film follows the story of a legion of dreaded, warring dacoits who once terrorized the Indian heartlands.

name: Stuck Apart
summary_text: The story of Aziz through an existential crisis longing for his youth: he is not happy with his work nor his private life, which is hijacked by his sister and her family, who have been living with him for some time now.

name: Titanic - La leggenda continua
summary_text: A Cinderella meets her Prince Charming on the ill-fated Titanic. Along for the ride are a rapping dog, other talking animals, and an assortment of wacky humans.

name: Restoration
summary_text: The exiled royal physician to King Charles II devotes himself to helping Londoners suffering from the plague, and in the process falls in love with an equally poor woman.

name: Easter Parade
summary_text: A nightclub performer hires a naive chorus girl to become his new dance partner to make his former partner jealous and to prove he can make any partner a star.

name: Wake of Death
summary_text: After his wife is brutally murdered, club enforcer Ben Archer wages war against the Chinese triads.

name: Son of Sardaar
summary_text: A guest tries to stay inside the house of a man who can't kill him unless he's outside, because of believing guest to be equal to God.

name: Camp Nowhere
summary_text: A group of junior high kids don't want to go to summer camps chosen by their parents. They make their own adult-free camp and "hire" an ex drama teacher to help.

name: Descendants 2
summary_text: Mal, Evie, Carlos and Jay try to adjust to life in Auradon, but Mal becomes overwhelmed with pressure and returns to her roots.

name: Doctor Who
summary_text: The newly-regenerated Doctor takes on the Master on the turn of the millennium, 31 December 1999.

name: The Handmaid's Tale
summary_text: Under a dystopian religious tyranny, most women cannot conceive children. Those young women who can live in a form of sexual slavery to provide children for influential families.

name: What Have I Done to Deserve This?
summary_text: The vicissitudes of Gloria, a neurotic housewife, and her family's peculiar characters.

name: StreetDance 2
summary_text: After suffering humiliation by the crew Invincible, street dancer Ash (Hentschel) looks to gather the best dancers from around the world for a rematch.

name: Wit
summary_text: A renowned professor is forced to reassess her life when she is diagnosed with terminal ovarian cancer.

name: The Desperate Hours
summary_text: Three escaped convicts move in on and terrorize a suburban household.

name: Interview with a Hitman
summary_text: An elite hitman returns to erase his past only to find that somebody has messed with his future.

name: Crossover
summary_text: The lives of a gifted athlete and his best friend change when they take a fateful trip to Los Angeles. The young hopefuls must use every skill at their command to topple the reigning street ball champions from their thrones.

name: Agent Sai Srinivasa Athreya
summary_text: Agent Sai Srinivasa Athreya is an authentic humorous investigative thriller revolving around the adventures of a detective based out of Nellore.

name: Battlestar Galactica
summary_text: After the destruction of the Twelve Colonies of Mankind, the last major fighter carrier leads a makeshift fugitive fleet in a desperate search for the legendary planet Earth.

name: F/X2
summary_text: A special effects man helps his girlfriend's ex, a cop, with a sting operation, where the ex gets killed. Something's off and he investigates with help from an ex-cop PI friend.

name: Bullet Head
summary_text: Three career criminals find themselves trapped in a warehouse with the law closing in and an even worse threat waiting inside - a nigh unstoppable killer dog.

name: Tragedy Girls
summary_text: A twist on the slasher genre, following two death-obsessed teenage girls who use their online show about real-life tragedies to send their small mid-western town into a frenzy, and cement their legacy as modern horror legends.

name: Gamle mænd i nye biler
summary_text: Fresh out of a Danish prison, Harald bosses his old gang around, into visiting his hospitalized foster dad, who wants to see his bio son before dying. The son's in a Swedish prison. Then there's a money matter - robbing a bank.

name: SubUrbia
summary_text: A group of suburban teenagers try to support each other through the difficult task of becoming adults.

name: Allan Quatermain and the Lost City of Gold
summary_text: Allan Quatermain once again teams up with Jesse Huston where the discovery of a mysterious old gold piece sends Quatermain looking for his long-lost brother, missing in the wilds of Africa after seeking a lost white race.

name: Boy Wonder
summary_text: A traumatized boy grows into a shy, determined teenager who patrols the mean streets of New York City, helping those in need and dishing out severe punishment to remorseless thugs.

name: Strangerland
summary_text: A family finds their dull life in a rural outback town rocked after their two teenage children disappear into the desert, sparking disturbing rumors of their past.

name: Happy Endings
summary_text: Happy Endings weaves multiple stories to create a witty look at love, family and the sheer unpredictability of life itself.

name: Shubh Mangal Savdhan
summary_text: In this remake of Kalyana Samayal Saadham (2013), a couple fall in love but then the groom discovers that he suffers from erectile dysfunction.

name: Marriage Italian Style
summary_text: The rich man Domenico and Filumena, a penniless prostitute, share great part of their lives in the immediate post WWII Italy.

name: The War Wagon
summary_text: The story of a man who was shot, robbed and imprisoned who returns to steal a large gold shipment from the man who wronged him. The gold is transported in an armored stage coach, the War Wagon.

name: New Kids Nitro
summary_text: Gerrie, Richard, Rikkert, Robbie and Barry from Maaskantje are in a big fight with the village of Schijndel. When a zombie kills someone from Brabant, things get out of hand.

name: The Assignment
summary_text: An American naval officer is recruited for an operation to eliminate his lookalike, the infamous terrorist Carlos The Jackal.

name: A Star Is Born
summary_text: A young woman comes to Hollywood with dreams of stardom, and achieves them only with the help of an alcoholic leading man whose best days are behind him.

name: My Favorite Year
summary_text: A dissolute matinee idol is slated to appear on a live TV variety show.

name: Miami Bici
summary_text: Miami Bici is the story of Ion and Ilie, two young people from a small dark city in Romania who go to Miami in the middle of winter, to live both the "American Dream" and the Romanian dream of "getting rich quick".

name: Day of the Dead: Bloodline
summary_text: A small group of military personnel and survivalists dwell in an underground bunker as they seek to find a cure in a world overrun by zombies.

name: Gloria
summary_text: When a young boy's family is killed by the mob, their tough neighbor Gloria becomes his reluctant guardian. In possession of a book that the gangsters want, the pair go on the run in New York.

name: Sweet Virginia
summary_text: A former rodeo champ befriends a young man with a propensity for violence.

name: The Dead
summary_text: An American mercenary, the sole survivor of a plane crash, has to run the gauntlet across Africa, battling with the living dead.

name: Otac na sluzbenom putu
summary_text: A family is deeply affected by father's extramarital affairs and the turbulent consequences of Tito-Stalin split.

name: Villains
summary_text: After a pair of amateur criminals break into a suburban home, they stumble upon a dark secret that two sadistic homeowners will do anything to keep from getting out.

name: Ragtime
summary_text: A young black pianist becomes embroiled in the lives of an upper-class white family set among the racial tensions, infidelity, violence, and other nostalgic events in early 1900s New York City.

name: CB4
summary_text: A guy makes a documentary of the rap band CB4 by following them. CB4 got popular by stealing Gusto's name, background and image. He wants them dead.

name: Captains Courageous
summary_text: A spoiled brat who falls overboard from a steamship gets picked up by a fishing boat, where he's made to earn his keep by joining the crew in their work.

name: Tschick
summary_text: Two young teenage boys steal a car and embark on a road trip that will probably change their lives.

name: Mumford
summary_text: In the small town of Mumford, a psychologist of the same name moves in and quickly becomes very popular, despite a questionable past.

name: Mere Brother Ki Dulhan
summary_text: A quirky rom-com where Kush finds the ideal Indian bride Dimple for his brother Luv and a series of comical and unpredictable events follow.

name: Mystery Team
summary_text: A group of former Encyclopedia Brown-style child-detectives struggle to solve an adult mystery.

name: Seems Like Old Times
summary_text: Wrongfully accused of a bank robbery, a writer seeks the help of his ex-wife, who is now married to the soon-to-be Attorney General. of California.

name: Mr. Nanny
summary_text: A former professional wrestler is hired to be the bodyguard/nanny for a couple of bratty kids whose inventor father is being stalked by a rival.

name: Stitches
summary_text: A clown comes back from the dead to haunt those who took his life during a fatal party mishap.

name: Paper Lives
summary_text: Mehmet is a cherished fellow who runs the solid waste warehouse in the neighborhood, he helps everyone in need, especially homeless children and teenagers since he was one too.

name: Calamity Jane
summary_text: The story of Calamity Jane, her saloon, and her romance with Wild Bill Hickok.

name: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
summary_text: A crime boss teams up with a cop to track down a serial killer.

name: Chup Chup Ke
summary_text: A debt-ridden young man attempts suicide, but is rescued only to find that his luck is finally turning.

name: Pokkiri
summary_text: Thamizh is a killer for hire with no ties and who will do any dirty job for money. He has a girlfriend who loves him but also detests his violent nature. But is Thamizh really what he purports to be?

name: Maigret Sets a Trap
summary_text: Chief Inspector Jules Maigret hunts for a serial killer.

name: The Package
summary_text: Experienced Green Beret sergeant Johnny Gallagher is escorting a prisoner, Airborne Ranger Thomas Boyette, back to the US, but Boyette escapes and Gallagher must risk life and limb to catch him.

name: Blind Chance
summary_text: Witek runs after a train. Three variations follow on how such a seemingly banal incident could influence the rest of Witek's life.

name: Baggage Claim
summary_text: Pledging to keep herself from being the oldest and the only woman in her entire family never to wed, Montana embarks on a thirty-day, thirty-thousand-mile expedition to charm a potential suitor into becoming her fiancé.

name: The Stunt Man
summary_text: A fugitive stumbles on a movie set just when they need a new stunt man, takes the job as a way to hide out and falls for the leading lady.

name: Feel the Beat
summary_text: After failing to find success on Broadway, April returns to her hometown and reluctantly is recruited to train a misfit group of young dancers for a big competition.

name: Topkapi
summary_text: A conman gets mixed up with a group of thieves who plan to rob an Istanbul museum to steal a jewelled dagger.

name: The Empty Man
summary_text: On the trail of a missing girl, an ex-cop comes across a secretive group attempting to summon a terrifying supernatural entity.

name: The Photographer of Mauthausen
summary_text: Based on real events, Francesc Boix is a Spaniard inmate in the Nazi concentration camp of Mauthausen in Austria who tries to save the evidences of the horrors committed inside its walls.

name: Superfast!
summary_text: A spoof on The Fast and the Furious (2001) and the following F&F movies. An undercover cop joins a gang of criminal street racers to get close to the LA crime kingpin.

name: Canim Kardesim
summary_text: Two poor men try to find a television as a last wish for the terminally ill brother of one of them.

name: Whispers
summary_text: A young couple grieving the recent death of their daughter move to the countryside where they are haunted by their tragedy and a sinister darkness.

name: The Last Wave
summary_text: A Sydney lawyer defends five Aboriginal Persons in a ritualized taboo murder and in the process learns disturbing things about himself and premonitions.

name: Chatroom
summary_text: 5 teenagers are introduced to each other in a chatroom called "Chelsea Teens!", all with different personalities. But when one shows its darker side, it threatens the life of the others.

name: Mohammad Rasoolollah
summary_text: The events, trials and tribulations of the city of Makkah in 7th century AD.

name: Oh, God!
summary_text: When God appears to an assistant grocery manager as a good natured old man, the Almighty selects him as his messenger for the modern world.

name: Louis C.K. Oh My God
summary_text: In February, 2013, Louis brings his impish nihilism to Phoenix, Arizona. He talks about an old lady and her pet, living in Manhattan, experiencing his body's aging (he's 45), men's ...                See full summary »

name: Cold Comes the Night
summary_text: A struggling motel owner and her daughter are taken hostage by a nearly blind career criminal to be his eyes as he attempts to retrieve his cash package from a crooked cop.

name: Man of the House
summary_text: A young boy refuses to accept his mother's new boyfriend, a lawyer, despite the man's attempts to win his respect. Meanwhile, disgruntled relative of a criminal he prosecuted seek revenge.

name: M. Butterfly
summary_text: In 1960s China, French diplomat Rene Gallimard falls in love with an opera singer, Song Liling - but Song is not at all who Gallimard thinks.

name: Le hérisson
summary_text: The life of a determined young girl is changed when she befriends her building's concierge, a solitary woman who is more than what she seems.

name: Branded
summary_text: In future Moscow, where corporate brands have created a disillusioned population, one man's effort to unlock the truth behind the conspiracy will lead to an epic battle with hidden forces that control the world.

name: Train of Life
summary_text: In 1941, the inhabitants of a small Jewish village in Central Europe organize a fake deportation train so that they can escape the Nazis and flee to Palestine.

name: A Twelve-Year Night
summary_text: 1973. Uruguay is governed by a military dictatorship. One autumn night, three Tupamaro prisoners are taken from their jail cells in a secret military operation. The order is precise: "As we...                See full summary »

name: Tarantula
summary_text: A spider escapes from an isolated Arizona desert laboratory experimenting in giantism and grows to tremendous size as it wreaks havoc on the local inhabitants.

name: The Batman Superman Movie: World's Finest
summary_text: Joker goes to Metropolis with an offer and plan to kill Superman for Lex Luthor while Batman pursues the clown to Superman's turf.

name: Film Stars Don't Die in Liverpool
summary_text: A romance sparks between a young actor and a Hollywood leading lady.

name: The Dirty Picture
summary_text: The love story between an actress and a director, inspired by the life of the late south Indian actress Silk Smitha.

name: Grease Live!
summary_text: After enjoying a summer romance, high school students Danny and Sandy are unexpectedly reunited when she transfers to Rydell High. There Sandy must contend with cynical Rizzo and the Pink Ladies in attempt to win Danny's heart again.

name: Queen of Hearts
summary_text: A successful lawyer jeopardizes her career and threatens to tear her family apart after engaging in an affair with her teenage stepson.

name: Cradle Will Rock
summary_text: A true story of politics and art in the 1930s U.S., focusing on a leftist musical drama and attempts to stop its production.

name: Truth or Die
summary_text: Young British boys and girls travel to an isolated cabin after being promised a night of heavy partying. Instead of the fun they hoped for, they meet a killer out to reap vengeance on them for the death of his brother.

name: My Old Lady
summary_text: An American inherits an apartment in Paris that comes with an unexpected resident.

name: Dumplings
summary_text: Aunt Mei's famous homemade dumplings provide amazing age-defying qualities popular with middle-aged women. But her latest customer - a fading actress - is determined to find out what the secret ingredient is.

name: Parineeta
summary_text: The lifelong romance between Lolita (Balan) and Shekar (Khan) is upset by the arrival of another man.

name: Avenging Angelo
summary_text: A woman who has just discovered she is the daughter of a murdered Mafia chieftain seeks revenge, with the aide of her father's faithful bodyguard.

name: Race Gurram
summary_text: Two brothers have two different approaches to life. While one brother follows rules and regulations, the other does things his own way.

name: Young and Innocent
summary_text: A man on the run from a murder charge enlists a beautiful stranger who must put herself at risk for his cause.

name: Black Widow
summary_text: A federal investigator tracks down a gold-digging woman who moves from husband to husband to kill them and collect the inheritance.

name: The Bridge at Remagen
summary_text: As the Allied armies close in, the Germans decide to blow up the last Rhine bridge, trapping their own men on the wrong side. But will it happen?

name: Shirley
summary_text: A famous horror writer finds inspiration for her next book after she and her husband take in a young couple.

name: Boruto: Naruto The Movie
summary_text: It's been some years since the end of the Shinobi War. Naruto Uzumaki is the 7th Hokage of Konohagakure, in this new era. His son, Boruto Uzumaki, will soon enter the Chûnin exams, alongside Sarada Uchiha and the mysterious Mitsuki.

name: Radio Rebel
summary_text: Tara, a painfully shy high-schooler, has a secret: she is also a confident DJ known as Radio Rebel, who lends her voice to others.

name: Another Gay Movie
summary_text: Four gay high school friends make a pact to lose their virginity before they go to college.

name: The Truth About Emanuel
summary_text: A troubled girl becomes preoccupied with her mysterious new neighbor, who bears a striking resemblance to her dead mother.

name: The Last Full Measure
summary_text: Thirty-four years after his death, Airman William H. Pitsenbarger, Jr. ("Pits") is awarded the nation's highest military honor, for his actions on the battlefield.

name: Julia
summary_text: At the behest of an old and dear friend, playwright Lillian Hellman undertakes a dangerous mission to smuggle funds into Nazi Germany.

name: Norm of the North
summary_text: When a real estate development invades his Arctic home, Norm and his three lemming friends head to New York City, where Norm becomes the mascot of the corporation in an attempt to bring it down from the inside and protect his homeland.

name: The Last Winter
summary_text: Sent to evaluate the environmental impact of oil drilling in the Arctic, James Hoffman clashes with the drilling crew's chief, who wants to get the job done.

name: Transit
summary_text: A man attempting to escape occupied France falls in love with the wife of a dead author whose identity he has assumed.

name: The Age of Shadows
summary_text: Korean resistance fighters smuggle explosives to destroy facilities controlled by Japanese forces in this period action thriller.

name: Anything for Her
summary_text: With no legal means left to him, a high school teacher devises a daring plan to rescue his wrongfully imprisoned wife from jail.

name: See Spot Run
summary_text: A mailman takes care of a dog that, unbeknownst to him, is an FBI drug-sniffing superdog that has escaped from the witness protection program after becoming the target of an assassination.

name: L'Argent
summary_text: A forged 500-franc note is passed from person to person until carelessness leads to tragedy.

name: Miss Bala
summary_text: After entering a beauty contest in Tijuana, a young woman witnesses drug-related murders and is forced to do the gang's bidding.

name: High Spirits
summary_text: When a hotelier attempts to fill the chronic vacancies at his castle by launching an advertising campaign that falsely portrays the property as haunted, two actual ghosts show up and end up falling for two guests.

name: The Young Girls of Rochefort
summary_text: Two sisters leave their small seaside town of Rochefort in search of romance. Hired as carnival singers, one falls for an American musician, while the other must search for her ideal partner.

name: Mrtav 'ladan
summary_text: Two brothers, Lemi and Kiza, having spent all their money, try to relocate their dead grandfather from Belgrade to Vrsac at the lowest cost, but he goes missing along the way.

name: The Disappearance of Eleanor Rigby: Her
summary_text: Told from the female perspective, the story of a couple trying to reclaim the life and love they once knew and pick up the pieces of a past that may be too far gone.

name: Dasavatharam
summary_text: After realizing the danger of a bio-weapon, a scientist wants to protect it from being misused. The vial accidentally reaches India, and he must race against time to prevent a potential disaster.

name: Arrambam
summary_text: A mysterious man along with a young computer hacker tries to unveil a major government conspiracy which resulted in several bloody deaths.

name: Little Ashes
summary_text: About the young life and loves of artist Salvador Dalí, filmmaker Luis Buñuel and writer Federico García Lorca.

name: Volunteers
summary_text: 1962, after Yale graduation, womanizing Lawrence flees a gambling debt that his rich dad won't pay. He takes his roomie's place as Peace Corps Volunteer in Thai Golden Triangle with 2 other PCVs. Will he survive 2 years?

name: The Battery
summary_text: The personalities of two former baseball players clash as they traverse the rural back roads of a post-plague New England teeming with the undead.

name: Targets
summary_text: An elderly horror film star, while making a personal appearance at a drive-in theatre, confronts a psychotic Vietnam War veteran who has turned into a mass-murdering sniper.

name: My Bodyguard
summary_text: When a boy comes to a new school and gets harassed by a bully, he acquires the services of the school's most feared kid as a bodyguard.

name: Permanent Vacation
summary_text: A young man wanders New York City searching for some meaning in life and encounters many idiosyncratic characters.

name: Bommarillu
summary_text: A young man realizes that he has to push back against his domineering father if he wants to find true happiness and love.

name: Plus One
summary_text: In order to survive a summer of wedding fever, longtime single friends, Ben and Alice, agree to be each other's plus one at every wedding they've been invited to.

name: Salaam Bombay!
summary_text: Heartrending story of the life lived in the back alleys and gutters of India. It is there that young Krishna must struggle to survive among the drug dealers, pimps, and prostitutes. In HD.

name: Cold Prey 2
summary_text: Jannicke wakes up in the hospital. All of her friends are dead. As she walks through the dark corridors, she thinks she is left alone. But the nightmare isn't over yet.

name: The Bitter Tears of Petra von Kant
summary_text: A successful fashion designer abandons a sado-masochistic relationship with her female assistant in favor of a love affair with a beautiful young woman.

name: Chico & Rita
summary_text: Chico is a young piano player with big dreams. Rita is a beautiful singer with an extraordinary voice. Music and romantic desire unites them, but their journey - in the tradition of the Latin ballad, the bolero - brings heartache and torment.

name: The Greatest
summary_text: A drama that is centered around a troubled teenage girl and a family that is trying to get over the loss of their son.

name: Romanzo criminale
summary_text: Set in the 1970s, it's the story of three lifelong friends who take control of organized crime in Rome.

name: The Passion of Anna
summary_text: A recently divorced man meets an emotionally devastated widow and they begin a love affair.

name: The Beautician and the Beast
summary_text: A New York City cosmetologist, mistakenly thought to be a science teacher, is offered a job to teach the children of an Eastern European dictator.

name: The Holiday Calendar
summary_text: A struggling but talented photographer inherits an antique holiday advent calendar, the contents of which seem to predict the future. Will this magical calendar lead her to love this holiday season?

name: Patiala House
summary_text: A talented young Indian cricket player must defy his father's wishes to play for the side of England, a rebellion his siblings quietly cheer.

name: Big Top Pee-wee
summary_text: Pee-wee Herman is now a small-town farmer with a fiancée, but when a traveling circus comes to town, he finds himself falling for the trapeze artist.

name: Tang shan da di zhen
summary_text: The epic story of a family separated as a result of the Great Tangshan Earthquake of 1976.

name: Ayan
summary_text: A young man's smuggling lifestyle takes a serious turn, when a fierce rival tries to eliminate him from the business.
